item.title: Unespecified features and the road so far
item.author: saulomastelini@gmail.com (Saulo Martiello Mastelini)
item.description: Maintaining a machine learning (ML) library sometimes makes you make tough decisions and take audacious paths. Those are the perks of creating something so close to research. Being a full-time ML researcher, I got used to the “rules of the game.” We do a literature review, find a good research gap, create relevant research questions, and develop some hypotheses. Then it is a matter of structuring your methodological setup to evaluate the proposed solutions.
